scenario_text.value:
Hey, Agumon, I was wondering. Does anything
scare you?

You bet! I’m scared of getting hurt, or of
having nothing to eat...
Yeah, those are all scary things.
So, maybe you can understand how Ryo feels.

When everything around you is scary, and you
feel stuck, what would make you feel better?

Uh... Getting away from what was scaring me?
If I was far away, I’d forget about it!
Right... Sure. I bet that’d work for you.

(I guess with Ryo, all I can really do is
keep an eye on him...)

What’s wrong, Takuma? Aren’t you going to
talk with Ryo?
